meanings.definition: To create a sequel to a work of fiction.
meanings.sent1: She sequelizes the popular book by writing a follow-up story.
meanings.sent2: The author sequelizes the movie with a new installment in the series.
meanings.sent3: The writer sequelizes the novel, adding more adventures for the characters.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination sequelizes the story, continuing the narrative in new ways.
meanings.sent5: He sequelizes the tale, extending the plot to captivate readers.

meanings.definition: To adapt a work of fiction into a sequel.
meanings.sent1: They sequelizes the original story into a thrilling new book.
meanings.sent2: The filmmaker sequelizes the classic movie, creating a modern follow-up.
meanings.sent3: The team sequelizes the script, crafting a sequel full of surprises.
meanings.sent4: She sequelizes the novel, transforming it into a captivating series.
meanings.sent5: He sequelizes the plot, expanding it into an exciting new adventure.

meanings.definition: The act of producing a sequel.
meanings.sent1: The sequelizes of the movie was a huge success at the box office.
meanings.sent2: Her job involves overseeing the sequelizes of popular films.
meanings.sent3: The sequelizes of the book led to high anticipation for the next installment.
meanings.sent4: He enjoys being part of the sequelizes process in the film industry.
meanings.sent5: The sequelizes of the series brought new life to the original story.
